mapper.select: SELECT id, app_code, access_key_id, access_key, secret_key, enable_status, enable_start, enable_stop, sort, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, remark, version FROM iam_access_key WHERE deleted = 0 AND app_code = #{appCode} AND access_key_id = #{accessKeyId} AND enable_status = #{enableStatus} ORDER BY sort ASC, id ASC
